front.title: PB-TNC: A Posture Broker (PB) Protocol Compatible with Trusted Network Connect (TNC)

abstract.t: This document specifies PB-TNC, a Posture Broker protocol identical to the Trusted Computing Group's IF-TNCCS 2.0 protocol. The document then evaluates PB-TNC against the requirements defined in the NEA Requirements specification. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
